title: Grants Pass
description: The apocalypse has arrived.Humanity was decimated by bio-terrorism; three engineered plagues were let loose on the world. Barely anyone has survived.Just a year before the collapse, Grants Pass, Oregon, USA, was publicly labelled as a place of sanctuary in a whimsical online, “what if” post. Now, it has become one of the last known refuges, and the hope, of mankind.Would you go to Grants Pass based on the words of someone you’ve never met?
author: Jennifer Brozek
